root.message: The DATA_VALIDATION field for indicator 12-1-1, translated into all languages

languages.language: Once data is received on the development, adoption and implementation of policy instruments, this data is reviewed to ensure that sufficient information is provided on the policy. In case insufficient information is provided, the National Focal Point is contacted to update the submission. However, the 10YFP or 10YFP secretariat is not responsible for the quality of the data provided and does not validate the quality of the policies submitted.
